definitions.definition: A short fanfic or prompt placing a reader insert in a novel scenario with a character or celebrity.
To form a mental image of something; to envision or create something in one's mind.
definitions.example: Try to imagine a pink elephant.

definitions.definition: To believe in something created by one's own mind.
definitions.example: She imagined that the man wanted to kill her.
I imagine that he will need to rest after such a long flight.
I cannot even imagine what you are up to!

definitions.definition: To contrive in purpose; to scheme; to devise.
